step.categories.choose.legend.other: Use checkboxes below to select the data you want to import. If required, the wizard will lead you through specific configuration for each feature and you will validate your choices before launching proper importation job. To have best control over the import process, you may select only one step and run the import tools many times.

step.categories.summary.legend.other: Here is a summary of the configuration. Please review it before launching importation in background.

step.connection.legend.other: Use the form below connect to the Pydio 8 server, using the dedicated user you have created.

step.meta.legend.other: 将元数据映射到资料库内部的功能。 从API或文件读取的全局元数据（监控或书签）将会直接从数据源内的.ajxp_meta文件转换而来。

step.meta.feature.watches.other: Watches set by user on files and folders

step.meta.feature.files.other: 文件和文件夹元数据：使用下面的映射来创建资料库元数据命名空间

step.meta.to.other: 资料库命名空间 (点击编辑)

step.disclaimer.other: Given the number of features provided by Pydio 8, each installation is unique and the tool cannot handle all possible combinations. It is best suited for importing data from a typical Pydio 8 installation including users, workspaces (fs and s3 only), access rights and shares.

step.disclaimer.ed.other: We strongly recommend you to contact our support (via your pydio.com account) and schedule an appointment to be walked through the migration by a Pydio Expert

step.disclaimer.home.other: We do not want to let you alone in the dark and the Pydio team offers a one-shot paying service to help you perform this migration on the open source version. Please contact our sales services if you wish to get help from a Pydio expert.

step.prereq.welcome.other: 启动 Pydio 8 导入工具。 本向导将引导您通过若干步骤从已有的 Pydio 8 服务器获取数据填充到 Pydio Cells中。

step.prereq.check.other: Please carefully read the pre-requisites described below and perform the necessary steps before starting the migration.

step.prereq.check.copy.other: Copy all Pydio 8 data (files and folders accessed by users) in a different location on the server. For testing purpose, you can eventually recreate the full arborescence with fake files (e.g 1byte files).

step.prereq.check.install.other: 在 Pydio 8 服务器上安装专用迁移插件。 解压并将文件夹放入你的 Pydio 8 服务器的插件文件夹中并清除插件缓存。从这里下载它

step.prereq.check.admincell.other: 创建具有管理权限的专用用户 (例如cells_importter)。 用户导入时将尝试将 Pydio 8 用户同步到Cells用户，只有此特定登录不会被触及。

step.prereq.check.adminpydio.other: Create a dedicated Pydio 8 user with administrative privileges, with another login (e.g. import). Some import tasks will automatically set read/write permissions for this import users on all workspaces.

step.prereq.ds.create.other: Create datasources pointing to the new data and wait for the indexation to be complete.

step.prereq.ds.tpl.ed.other: 对于"每个用户"的工作区(如我的文件)，使用现有的资料库"个人"模板路径，或为新位置准备新的模板路径。

step.prereq.ds.tpl.home.other: 对于"每个用户"的工作区(如我的文件)，请确保将数据放置在已存在的资料库“个人”模板路径下。

step.prereq.ds.done.other: Once datasources are properly indexed, you can start the migration process. The wizard will help you map your Pydio 8 workspaces to new workspaces.

step.shares.alert.other: Please pick at least one share type!

step.shares.legend.other: 将 Pydio 8 公开连接和共享文件夹导入到Cells中。公开链接将用相同的标识符和属性创建(密码、到期等)。在 Pydio 8 中作为工作区共享的文件夹将被映射到新的资料库。

step.shares.restrict.type.other: 1. Restrict the type of shares to be imported (select at least one):

step.shares.restrict.user.other: 2. For testing purpose, you can limit import to a specific user

step.ws.legend.other: 从Pydio 8导入工作区是一个多步骤过程：

step.ws.step1.other: 1. 手动将现有数据从当前服务器迁移到新服务器(如果您在同一服务器上运行 Pydio 和 Cells 的话就没有必要)。

step.ws.step2.other: 2. 创建指向服务器上新存储位置的Cells数据源。

step.ws.step3.other: 3. Wait for all datasources to be properly indexed.

step.ws.step4.other: 4. Map old workspaces to new workspaces by using the tool below

step.mapper.wsnumber.other: 从服务器映射 %s 个工作空间到新的资料库工作区

step.mapper.loading.error.other: Error while loading workspaces from server: %s. Make sure to have CORS enabled on your Pydio8 installation.

step.mapper.invalid.other: Invalid mapping - Please select a datasource or a workspace

dash.feature.configs.legend.other: 此步骤无需配置。AD/LDAP配置将导入到 Pydio Cells 外部目录。

dash.feature.users.legend.other: There is no specific configuration for this step. Users will be synchronized with remote server. Whenever possible, their hashed password will be imported too (no password is store or transmitted clear), so that users can log with the same identifier on the new server.

dash.feature.acls.legend.other: There is no specific configuration for this step. Access list will be loaded from server and applied to workspaces.

action.createws.summary.other: The following uuid => uuid mapping will be applied:

action.share.linksonly.other: Only Public Links will be imported.

action.share.cellsonly.other: 只有共享文件夹将被导入。

action.share.all.other: All shares will be imported (links and shared folders).

action.share.user.other: Only shares owned by %s will be imported.

action.meta.summary.other: The following metadata will be imported:

action.meta.files.other: For files metadata, the following mapping will be used:
